message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a fair deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand you have a budget to work with. I'm willing to come down to $9,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. I'm hoping we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $9,250. Can you consider this price?
